true.speed: The SpeedShake™ charges up the inner Woc inside you...
true.slow: The SlowShake™ charges your up your inner woc, but it still isn't strong...
true.turbo: The TurboShake™ charges up your inner Woc to extreme levels...
true.reset: The ResetShake™ returns your inner Woc to normal levels...

false.speed: The SpeedShake™ calms your inner woc down, but not fully...
false.slow: The SlowShake™ discharges your inner Woc beyond comprehension...
false.turbo: The TurboShake™ dampens your inner woc, but it is still highly active...
false.reset: The ResetShake™ returns your inner Woc to normal levels...
